title: Just a tiny request.
body:
Please add some {{champion:92}} taunts and jokes vs certain characters like {{champion:27}} and {{champion:157}}. It would make my season(s). 

Serious bonus points for keeping Christina Vee as her voice actor.

replies.body:
That's a great idea! 

We usually try to add in new dialog when a character is getting re-worked/re-launched, or if they are central to the story of one of our events, (i.e. - Shurima.) That's mostly to do with issues of scheduling and efficiency.  Bringing in a voice actor/actress to record a few lines isn't as awesome as bringing them in to do a hundred new lines.

Trust me, we love having more voiceover for our beloved Champs! We just have to make sure we're making the best use of the actor/actress' time when we do decide to record.

Cheers! =)
I always wondered... it is not a truly mess to always call back dubbers for an update? And if you do, you make them register voice files also for other champions that are dubbed by the same dubber?

Well then, when you give Udyr{{champion:77}}  his much needed VU, i also hope you take the time to record some additional lines for his Ultimate skin so its on par with your current legendaries.

Seriously Dunkmaster Darius has like 30 tauns, 20 Jokes, and 40 lines for items... its unfair...
What about Viktor then? He just got a pretty big update and i expected him to get some new lines like every other updated champ before him- how come he didn't get anything there?

However why not champs who get a TU?
singed is getting one and it looks awesome,however he doesn't get any new lines,which means he is now stuck in a weird place quality-wise,where his model looks better than that of most other champs,but his VO is absolutely terrible(he has only 12 lines,which includes already his 3 laughs).

Not to mention the lack of animations and special effects some TU-champions suffer(again singed is a prime example,he doesn't even have a joke animation and his ultimate looks simply outdated)

Yay that's awesome =). i hope you guys work on Riven soon cause she is so awesome and deserve some love.

But no pressure guys, take your time to deliver the best!

I'm not so sold on this recent trend of zillions of lines in the VO, since it seems that -in order for the champion to say them all- the spacing between them has been severely reduced. What I'm trying to point out is that Azir says "Shrurima" about 15 times per minute and Sion is the most talkative zombie I've ever seen, he really seems unable to shuts the fk up.

What I'm trying to point out is that Azir says "Shrurima" about 15 times per minute and Sion is the most talkative zombie I've ever seen, he really seems unable to shuts the fk up.

To be fair, all I want is some taunts and jokes so I can understand Riven's lore better. I dont need too much talking, but I want complain if I get it.

@Riot Eno

Can you comment on champions who have already received a visual rework, like Nidalee, who have very few base lines?  It'd be really nice to see a sound rework for some of the early visual reworks who have fine models and animations now, but are sorely lacking in the audio department compared to Twitch and Sion.

:D

Where could I expect to see such an update? A Ionia lore update perhaps? When might that happen??
